alert.note: Alert for Calhoun; Chickasaw; Pontotoc; Yalobusha (Mississippi) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Memphis (Western Tennessee, Eastern Arkansas and Northern Mississippi)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued October 12 at 10:47PM CDT by NWS Memphis
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of Chickasaw, east central Yalobusha, Calhoun and southwestern Pontotoc Counties through 1115 PM CDT... At 1047 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Bruce, or 20 miles southeast of Water Valley, moving southeast at 45 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Houston, Bruce, Calhoun City, Vardaman, Derma, Pittsboro, Pyland, Banner, Trebloc, Houlka, New Houlka, Woodland, Robbs, Thorn, Reid, Loyd, Ellard, Thelma, McCondy and Atlanta. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
